body_html: The reason might be related to the reduction dimension in reduce_mean: reducing along the second dimension might be slower than along the last dimension because of the memory access pattern. You can run Timeline or tf prof (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/core/profiler) to find out more.
body_text: The reason might be related to the reduction dimension in reduce_mean: reducing along the second dimension might be slower than along the last dimension because of the memory access pattern. You can run Timeline or tf prof (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/core/profiler) to find out more.
body: The reason might be related to the reduction dimension in reduce_mean: reducing along the second dimension might be slower than along the last dimension because of the memory access pattern. You can run Timeline or tf prof (https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/core/profiler) to find out more.
